meanings.definition: A type of soft, thick paper used for padding or insulation.
meanings.sent1: I wrapped the fragile item in bumfs to protect it during shipping.
meanings.sent2: The package was filled with bumfs to keep the contents safe.
meanings.sent3: The cat found a cozy spot among the bumfs and took a nap.
meanings.sent4: The walls of the old house were insulated with layers of bumfs.
meanings.sent5: The sound of rain hitting the bumfs outside was soothing.

meanings.definition: Useless or unnecessary paperwork or documentation.
meanings.sent1: The office was cluttered with stacks of bumfs that no one ever looked at.
meanings.sent2: She spent hours sorting through the bumfs to find the important documents.
meanings.sent3: The detective sifted through the bumfs looking for a clue.
meanings.sent4: The bumfs on his desk seemed to multiply overnight.
meanings.sent5: Her desk was buried under a mountain of bumfs.

meanings.definition: To pad or line with soft, thick paper.
meanings.sent1: She carefully bumfsed the box before sealing it.
meanings.sent2: The craftsman bumfsed the inside of the jewelry box to protect the delicate pieces.
meanings.sent3: He bumfsed the walls of the room to keep the sound from echoing.
meanings.sent4: The tailor bumfsed the costume to give it a more luxurious feel.
meanings.sent5: The artist bumfsed the canvas before starting to paint.
